short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies your work for working in the CloudLab backend.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool was built to help speed up your workflow. It allows you to format text as a single line or multiple lines from a spreadsheet for product codes, SKUs, and anything else you need to standardize. Also available is the color Conversion tab that helps speed up adding new colors to your website. It outputs the RGB and CMYK decimal values for your HEX code. The last tab is a measurement conversions tool to help you create custom-size templates.

Key Features:
- Settings to fine-tune what you want to be converted.
- Do simple measurement conversions from millimeters to centimeters, inches, feet, yards, and points.
- Create new colors simply by typing or pasting in the hex code and copying the RGB and CMYK outputs.
- Saves to local storage so it will open back up where you left off
- Light and dark mode
- Paste in data from a spreadsheet and copy the output easily
- Create SKUs, Name Codes, and ID's faster.
Since version 6.0.0 
- Added a todo tab to store todo lists
- Added a note tab to store notes for later.
Since version 6.1.0
- Added the Page Option Tool.
